WorkItem.ClosedComment: Nothing to fix - this was a problem caused by skipping a step in the tutorial.
WorkItem.Description:
Hi Jon:

I have been enjoying your tutorial.  What a Great Job! It has been challenging for a newbie.  I had a problem with the Album Template, but resolved it when I rebuilt it.  I guess I did not build after before adding the edit Template.

Thank you
WorkItem.Summary: Help with Edit Form in Album Template

Comments.Message: Thanks, glad you like it! Yes, you need to build before adding the view (that's the step on the bottom of page 24). I'm going to close this, let me know if you have other problems with it.
